lead_paragraph: A summary in some editions on Thursday of an online article about Comcast’s decision to hire the veteran producer Mike Weisman to improve its national sports networks described the personnel move incorrectly. He was hired as a consultant; he was not hired “away from NBC,” where he remains under contract.
